name: Keke's Grab N' Go
address: 7423 Amboy Rd, Staten Island, NY 10307, USA

reviews.text: best pizza in staten island, the place is always clean and the customer service is amazing.

I never come on here to write reviews but this place left me no choice. I came in earlier today and the service up front and over the phone was horrible and completely disrespectful and then when me and my nephew came in there was a mouse‚Ä¶

If I could give 0 reviews I would. The place is disgusting if you go into the bathroom there is bugs all over the place. There was a bug in my pizza and when I told the Manager Kim she completely dismissed me and is completely disgusting‚Ä¶
Has one of the best regular pies I‚Äôve ever had. And they always have really good deals!! I got a regular pie for $8 once while they had a special.
Good food, good price, staff is super nice
Maria was awesome! Super friendly and loved having her as our server. We will most certainly be back!
Great food !!!!!!

WE LOVE EVA! My family and I come here a lot and we try and sit in her section everytime, she‚Äôs so sweet and accommodating, she makes you feel like family, and she‚Äôs so quick! You ask for something and it‚Äôs there within seconds. Her heart is so big. The food is great, but we keep coming back here just to see Eva! ü´∂üèªü´∂üèª
Thank-you, Eva for all you do!

Anthony S phone in order.... sends thank you, Halloween night they were so nice, they were pumping out pies not even stopping, great pizza, and to top it off great service!!! Happy Halloween!!!! Thank you for our pies!!!!!!!
There Brooklyn Pie is Phenomenal. And the Staff is Amazing
Jeanine was great!
Best pizza in town, this place is a gem! highly recommend the Brooklyn pie!
We love Kekes its our go to neighborhood spot!  The owner and the staff are so welcoming and the food is awesome!
Excellent üëåüëç
Great food. Love their paninis and pizza!
Everything is GREAT!!!!! all my orders! Above and Beyond! High quality and great service 10/10 for me! Thank you guys!!!
I‚Äôm hooked‚Ä¶ terrific food, lovely people and the best Brooklyn Pizza!!!‚ù§Ô∏èüëçüèª

Brooklyn Pie well done
So good, similar to L&B
Grandma's Brooklyn Silician pie is one of the best on Staten Island. Just like L&B in Brooklyn without the crime.
Closest Brooklyn pie compared to L n B
First time coming here  for a vegan Sicilian pie and it was amazing. Friendly staff, clean restaurant, My girlfriend and me will definitely come back here to eat again. üî•üî•üî•üî•üî•‚Ä¶

I've been here twice, I live on the other side of the island so I don't get to go here too much but when I do it's an amazing experience. I've had the Brooklyn style pizza and The grandpa pie,  they are freaking mouth watering amazing. I love this place!
Owners are wonderful,  grandpa pie, and brooklyn pie are UNBELIEVABLE the best best around , the gluten free margherita is amazing too!
BEST. PIZZA.  EVER.  Try the ‚Äúbackwards Sicilian‚Äù slice.  üòã‚Ä¶
It was our server's first day and she did a wonderful job.  The food was delicious.  Best chicken noodle soup I have eaten in a restaurant.

This restaurant has good pizza and good food here
One of tottenville finest pizzerias

Great addition to the neighborhood
Good location
Great L&B pie everything i ate there was üëç‚Ä¶
Completely raw unbaked bread and grossest Francese slice I‚Äôve ever seen
The Brooklyn pie is delishhhh..sammies, dinners, apps all great. Haven't had a bad meal here yet!
Omg had the brooklyn pie sweet potatoe fries and zuchinni fries and everything is so good! I loved it seriously will never go anywhere else not even to l and b... thanks for the great food!
Wait time is outrageous, seem pretty dysfunctional. With that said, the food is good! Lol
Brooklyn pie, outstanding!
Love this place. Their two for one Tuesday specials never disappoint! Their pizza is always good as well. Dina is the best and always makes you feel welcomed and thanks you for coming in.

The wait blows, but the food is worth it. Just one critique would be, have a little more zing to the sauce and this place would be 100% bar stool 5 stars. The texture to hot melted cheese is perfecto!  The staff is friendly so when you  pick up your order, it's a decent time. I would reccomend this place to family and friends. üëç‚Ä¶
Delicious in every way

Kind of pricey and on top of that waited 30+ min for an appetizer sampler to go! Than after the fact open up and is missing items and substituted with other items without even asking, totally dissatisfied.
The food and service are very good
Never disappoints!
Best Pizza in Tottenville

Pros: Pretty place, homey feel, fresh fruit was good, service was okay and seemed friendly. Pizza is great , owners nice and presentation was good

Cons: omelettes are just a flat egg with vegetables thrown inside, toast was burnt, pancakes doughy, meat was not tasty at all

Only giving one star because it wont let me leave negative stars. Ordered a Brooklyn style pizza was told it would take about 45 minutes. No problem. An hour and 20 mins passes. Call them back "were waiting for the pie to finish cooking‚Ä¶

Place is excellent - food is fresh and delicious!  immaculate- everything new! - breakfast - Lunch - dinner - salads - fries -pizza - wraps- and specials are Delicious! Cozy Warm- atmosphere- .Our lady help of Christians Church across the‚Ä¶

You would‚Äôve thought they would tell you what‚Äôs in there chicken empanadas(peppers) when you order since their is no sign that says what it contains! Mind you I‚Äôm highly allergic!!! What do you think the outcome of that was ? Terrible & the food was not good at all.
Firdt time on columbus...the mango n grilled shrimp salad was great...the cornflakes coated chickn fingers was superbly crunchy.....the waitress was kind n patient(n pretty!)...bravo
New spot in Tottenville. Extra clean and owner/staff are great. I love the buffalo chicken pie.
I ride my bike here all the time it is a great place and the staff treats you like family
The Brooklyn pie is my favorite! Always welcomed, get a pie once a week!
Poor Food quality and the Mac N Cheese balls have no flavor everything just tasted dry
Very good and the waiters are very kind and nice to the kids
The pizza was great and the service was even better
